HI,

MY FRIEND YOU NEED TO INVESTIGATE "ARTICLE 8" ASK THE SPIRITS TO TO TELL YOU IN DETAIL WHAT "ARTICLE 8" MEANS AND SAYS.

Folks this is what I call true RESEARCH getting information from the other side, so we can understand the TRUE political aspect of their existence etc. on the other side.

Our Human spirits may not be exploited in the EARTH sense, yet their is a sense of being taken advantage of because of our ignorance of the other dimension and how it works, understanding the physics and all.

I READ IN ROBERT MONROE BOOKS ABOUT "LOUSH" a form of energy that is harvested from our souls. I cannot say more about that because of ignorance, except what Monroe wrote about.

As for qualified Scientists, YOU GET THE BEEF THEY WILL COME. In order words get the evidence and show it to those who are interested. LIKE FINDING OUT IN DETAIL WHAT "ARTICLE 8" means.

ALSO WHY NOT GIVE A SCIENTIST FRIEND A BOX to play with? IF you have an old Physics Professor, or acquaintance give them a box, tell them   
how to use it, and then ask them their opinions about the results obtained.  

I WILL SAY FROM MY READINGS THE UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT HAS A NUMBER OF BLACK PROJECTS DEALING WITH HIGH ENERGY PHYSICS, and one of those projects deals with the Astral, the soul etc. BUT THE SHAME IS, IT IS ALL KEPT IN  SECRET.

Now the Indian Mystics talk about BEINGS in the Astral planes that want our souls, because our souls are IMMORTAL, and these BEINGS ARE NOT IMMORTAL they truly die in a few thousand years.. How they use our souls to attain Immortality I do not know. 

 __________________________________________________
